title: Brugge Hotel Built on Heritage Cathedral Ruins near Market Square
description: In a timeless medieval city of canals and cobblestone streets, Crowne Plaza Brugge, an IHG Hotel is a refined retreat offering modern comfort and service just five minutes from the bustling Market Square. Enjoy outstanding locally-sourced dishes at the PlazaCafe restaurant, refresh and renew yourself at the indoor pool and fitness centre or take a trip through time as you gaze upon the heritage ruins of Saint Donatian's cathedral, located in the basement of the hotel.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Brugge, an IHG Hotel
